howToPlay.title: How to Play?
howToPlay.messageOne: There are 8 pieces and 1 empty space on the board.
howToPlay.messageTwo: The goal is to bring the stones to the target sequence (1 to 8 in order).
howToPlay.messageThree: First, take a look at the ‘Target Board’, then create the ‘Placement Board’.
howToPlay.messageFour: After placing all the tiles, press the 'Start' button.
howToPlay.messageFive: The algorithm (A* method) shows the solution step by step.
howToPlay.messageSix: You can stop the animation by pressing the ‘Stop’ button.
howToPlay.messageSeven: When stopped, the solution or the latest status is shown on the screen.
